title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: User cannot log in after multiple attempts; password reset not working.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: January invoice download fails with network error on billing page.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes instantly on Android 13 after splash screen.

title: Payment Method Not Saving
description: New credit card can’t be saved to profile; 422 validation error.

title: Email Notifications Delayed
description: Support updates arrive 3–4 hours late for some users.

title: 2FA Code Not Received
description: SMS OTP not delivered to Grameenphone numbers during peak hours.

title: Profile Avatar Upload Fails
description: PNG uploads above 1 MB return 500 from media service.

title: Search Results Inaccurate
description: Keyword search ignores filters for date range and status.

title: Webhook Retries Exceeded
description: Order.created webhook times out; partner endpoint returns 504.

title: Dark Mode Contrast Issue
description: Text in buttons too dim when system theme is dark.
